alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Lexington; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 7:19PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Calhoun, east central Lexington and southeastern Richland Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 719 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near South Congaree, or near Red Bank, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Columbia, West Columbia, Cayce, Forest Acres, Springdale, McEntire Air Base, Red Bank, Oak Grove, South Congaree, Pine Ridge, Gaston, Hopkins, Horrel Hill, SC State Farmer`s Market, Columbia Metro Airport, SC State Fair Grounds, West Columbia Riverwalk, Five Points, Fort Jackson and Woodfield. This includes the following highways... Interstate 126 near mile marker 3. Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 50 and 53. Interstate 26 between mile markers 111 and 123. Interstate 77 between mile markers 0 and 15. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for central South Carolina.
